DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study show efficacy single dose PRO-513 treating subject suffer moderate pain form migraine attack , without aura . The study also intend show effectiveness PRO-513 associate symptom nausea , photophobia , phonophobia due migraine attack .
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Study Single Dose Treatment PRO-513 Subjects Suffering Migraine Attack
DOC.criteria: Male Female subject 1865 year age Primary diagnosis migraine attack aura migraine attack without aura Migraine history average least 1 migraine attack per month average 6 migraine attack per month prior year Female subject must use effective form birth control Listing additional inclusion criterion available Sponsor Excluding subject history serious event cause secondary headache Excluding subject current medical condition could interfere overall study intent affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion study medication Excluding subject history current medical condition could confound study result use concomitant medication could interfere study drug Listing additional exclusion criterion available Sponsor
